Class RoundRobinElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.RoundRobinElection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Election

    public class RoundRobinElection
extends Object
implements Election
    Simply choose the leader in a round robin way.

      • specifyLeader

        public void specifyLeader(String leader)
        Description copied from interface: Election
        Specifies the leader explicitly. If the server starts by joining the cluster, it doesn't need to go through the leader election. However, the other servers who go back to recovery phase might ask it about the leader information. They can initialize them the knowledge about leader explicitly once they join a cluster.
        Specified by:
        specifyLeader in interface Election

      • reply

        public void reply(MessageTuple tuple)
        Description copied from interface: Election
        Replies its vote to peer. The leader/follower might receive election message in non-electing phase, it ask Election object to reply its vote.
        Specified by:
        reply in interface Election
        Parameters:
        tuple - the message from the querier.
